programme.title: River Cottage
programme.desc: Hugh Fearnley-Whittingstall turns his attention to vegetables. After trying to win over the shoppers of Bridport with crudites, he hopes to persuade Poole Fire Station's Green Watch to go vegetarian for four days. He also takes a look at ways to prepare broad beans and celery, while Gill Meller demonstrates how to use potato as a main course, and Pam Corbin makes piccalilli.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals
programme.desc: The search for a chef to be crowned Professional MasterChef Champion 2015 is almost over, as the three finalists face one last challenge. They are given three hours to cook a starter, a main course and a dessert, with each course showcasing their culinary abilities, including execution, flavour and presentation. Judges Marcus Wareing, Monica Galetti and Gregg Wallace then assess their efforts, before deciding upon the winner.(n)

programme.title: The Hairy Bikers' Asian Adventure
programme.desc: Dave Myers and Si King travel around Asia exploring the roots of some of their favourite dishes from the continent. They begin in Hong Kong, where they learn about the versatility of the wok in Cantonese cuisine at a street-food stall, while breakfast reveals a surprising legacy of British rule, before the duo are sent on their way with a traditional Chinese good luck ceremony.(n)

programme.title: Speed Racer
programme.desc: The Matrix masterminds Andy and Larry Wachowski usher anime icon Tatsuo Yoshida's classic 1960s-era hit into the new millennium with this family-friendly story of a young racecar driver who takes on the mysterious Racer X in a custom-made, gadget-loaded speed machine named the Mach 5. Speed Racer (Emile Hirsch) is the kind of driver that every wheelman wishes he could be: a born winner whose unbeatable combination of aggression, instinct, and fearlessness always finds him crossing the checkered flag with a comfortable lead. In Speed Racer's mind, the only driver who could present him with any real challenge is his late brother -- the legendary Rex Racer. Rex died in a heated cross-country rally known as The Crucible many years ago, and now his younger sibling is driven to fulfill the legacy that Rex left behind. To this day, Speed Racer is fiercely loyal to family. It was Speed Racer's father, Pops Racer (John Goodman), who designed the unbeatable Mach 5, and even a lucrative offer from racing giants Royalton Industries isn't enough to get the young ace to break his family ties. Upon turning down Royalton's (Roger Allam) astronomical offer, Speed Racer makes the shocking discovery that the outcomes of the biggest races are being predetermined by a handful of powerful moguls who pad their profits by manipulating the drivers. Realizing that his career would be ruined if word of the fix gets out, Royalton vows that the Mach 5 will never make it to another finish line. Now, the only way for Speed Racer to save the family business and beat Royalton at his own game will be to win the very same race that claimed his brother's life so many years ago. In order to accomplish that formidable feat, however, Speed Racer will not only have to rely on his family and the aid of his longtime girlfriend, Trixie (Christina Ricci), but form a tenuous alliance with his longtime rival -- the mysterious Racer X (Matthew Fox) -- as well(n)

programme.title: The Lizzie McGuire Movie
programme.desc: Teen queen Lizzie McGuire grows up a bit and hits the big screen in this comedy drama, based on the popular Disney Network series. Lizzie McGuire (Hilary Duff) and her best friends Kate (Ashlie Brillault), Gordo (Adam Lamberg), and Ethan (Clayton Snyder) have just graduated from middle school, and to celebrate, they're taking part in a class trip to Rome, Italy. Eager to celebrate their new maturity as high school students, Lizzie and her pals hope to live it up in one of Europe's most fabled cities, but fate has something more spectacular in store for Lizzie. Lizzie discovers that she bears a striking resemblance to Isabella, an Italian teen-pop idol famous for her duets with heart-throb Paolo (Yani Gellman) -- so much so that when Paolo and Isabella have a falling out, he asks Lizzie to take Isabella's place for an upcoming concert. Lizzie, however, isn't sure she feels comfortable stepping into the spotlight, and is even less sure about the way she feels about Paolo, who makes no secret of his infatuation with her. Things don't get any simpler for Lizzie when her family gets wind of her newfound fame, and catch the next flight to Italy. The Lizzie McGuire Movie also features Robert Carradine and Hallie Todd as Lizzie's parents, and Jake Thomas as her younger brother Matt, all of whom reprise their roles from the television series(n)

programme.title: The Winning Season
programme.desc: In this touching comedy-drama, an alcoholic named Bill (Sam Rockwell) seeks redemption by coaching his daughter's high-school basketball team after his drinking problem squandered a career in the NBA. Directed by James C. Strouse(n)

programme.title: Victor Frankenstein
programme.desc: This reimagining of the Frankenstein mythos focuses on Igor, the assistant of Victor Frankenstein. When the mad scientist builds an undead creature that soon becomes a grave danger, it's up to Igor to save Frankenstein from both the monster and himself(n)

programme.title: Making 'Neighbors 2: Sorority Rising'
programme.desc: A look at "Neighbors 2: Sorority Rising," a sequel to the 2014 comedy that finds a young couple plagued by yet another Greek menace: the sisters of Kappa Kappa Nu. The film stars Seth Rogen, Zac Efron and Chloë Grace Moretz, and is directed by Nicholas Stoller(n)

programme.title: Friday
programme.desc: Ice Cube and Chris Tucker (star of the Rush Hour movies) are two LA guys hanging out on a Friday - Ice Cube's just been fired from his job but Tucker has a more serious concern - he smoked rather than sold the $200 stash of dope he got from Faizon Love. Now the two have a choice - find the money by the end of the day or enter a whole world of pain in F Gary Gray's black comedy(n)

programme.title: Demolition
programme.desc: An investment banker attempts to cope with his wife's sudden death by becoming obsessed with physically deconstructing technologies that surround him. His complaints to a vending machine company spark an unexpected relationship with a customer service rep(n)

programme.title: Loving
programme.desc: Jeff Nichols (Midnight Special, Mud) wrote and directed this biopic about Virginian interracial couple Richard and Mildred Loving (played by Joel Edgerton and Ruth Negga), who were sentenced to prison in 1958 for violating the state's laws against miscegenation. The Lovings decided to fight back, and their case led to a landmark Supreme Court decision that struck down laws prohibiting interracial marriage(n)

programme.title: Room 104
programme.desc: I Knew You Weren't Dead. A visitor seeks advice about his marital troubles from a long-lost friend(n)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Make Believe. Spencer faces new challenges convincing Wayne to finance his Las Vegas initiative, and wonders exactly where he fits in the city's pecking order. Meanwhile, Julie thinks a home-cooked meal will mend the rift between Larry and Coach Berg; Vernon gets a surprise visit from a league official; Joe becomes obsessed with virtual reality; and Ricky loses focus and pays the price(n)

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Death Is the Enemy. Jon's mission continues north of the wall, but the odds against his ragged band of misfits may be greater than he imagined(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.sub-title: Controlling the Narrative & Power to Congo
programme.desc: Controlling the Narrative & Power to Congo. Gianna Toboni reports from the Philippines on the government's crackdown on the media and President Rodrigo Duterte's brutal war on drugs; Ben Anderson returns to the Democratic Republic of the Congo to witness the conservation efforts of park rangers who are fighting to protect wildlife and natural resources(n)

programme.title: Good Will Hunting
programme.desc: Costars and co-writers Matt Damon and Ben Affleck won an Oscar for their tale of a charismatic genius (Damon) who lands in jail after a playground brawl. His hope for the future lies with a sympathetic therapist (Best Supporting Actor Robin Williams), who understands the young man's rebellious nature. Minnie Driver, Stellan Skarsgard, Casey Affleck(n)

programme.title: Room 104
programme.desc: I Knew You Weren't Dead. A visitor seeks advice about his marital troubles from a long-lost friend(n)

programme.title: George Lopez: The Wall, Live from Washington D.C.
programme.desc: Comedian George Lopez performs in Washington, D.C., at the Kennedy Center. Topics include organic food, dogs in strollers and food allergies(n)

programme.title: Hairspray
programme.desc: John Travolta, Christopher Walken, Queen Latifah, Amanda Bynes, James Marsden, Allison Janney, Michelle Pfeiffer, and newcomer Nikki Blonsky star in this feature adaptation of the hit Broadway musical inspired by the classic 1988 John Waters comedy of the same name. Set during the height of America's civil rights movement, Hairspray follows fancy-foot-working teen Tracy Turnblad (Blonsky) as she ascends to fame on a local Baltimore television dance program(n)

programme.title: Rain Man
programme.desc: Losing his inheritance to the autistic brother he never knew he had, Charlie Babbitt tracks down his savant sibling and takes him on a road trip; his mercenary motives giving way to a profound new understanding of the brilliant yet troubled Raymond(n)

programme.title: Hitchcock/Truffaut
programme.desc: Filmmakers discuss the impact of Francois Truffaut's 1966 book "Hitchcock/Truffaut", in which Alfred Hitchcock painstakingly detailed his directorial process(n)

programme.title: Lady in the Water
programme.desc: Downtrodden caretaker Cleveland Heep is drawn into a dangerous world of 'narfs' and 'scrunts' by Story, an ethereal sea nymph who appears in the residents' pool(n)

programme.title: Making of 'The Boss'
programme.desc: A look at "The Boss," a 2016 comedy about a successful businesswoman jailed for insider trading who seeks redemption upon her release. The film stars Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Bell and Peter Dinklage, and is directed by Ben Falcone(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood: Men in Tights
programme.desc: A veteran of the Crusades brings together a ragtag group to do battle against an evil king, and gets help from a surprising source inside the royal castle in this spoof of the Robin Hood legend(n)

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: This inspiring biopic of airline pilot Chesley "Sully" Sullenberger depicts his successful emergency landing of an Airbus A320 on the Hudson River in January 2009. In the aftermath of this unprecedented feat, he must endure the weight of sudden fame, second-guessing by investigators and his own doubts about his actions that fateful day(n)

programme.title: K-PAX
programme.desc: The 1995 novel by Dr. Gene Brewer becomes this drama from director Iain Softley. After a mugging incident at New York's Grand Central Station, Prot (Kevin Spacey), a man who claims to be an alien from the planet K-PAX, is turned over to a public mental hospital and the care of Dr. Mark Powell (Jeff Bridges). When medication fails to alter Prot's insistence that he is visiting from another world on a fact-finding mission, Powell gets more involved with his patient, who seems to have a calming effect on the other residents of his ward. At first convinced that Prot is a delusional who can be treated, Powell begins to wonder if his bizarre patient's story is true, particularly after the hospital's doctors find that Prot possesses the baffling ability to see ultraviolet light. As the date grows nearer when Prot claims he must leave Earth (a "class BA-III planet"), Powell becomes increasingly concerned that a psychiatric breakthrough must occur by then. K-PAX (2001) co-stars Alfre Woodard and Mary McCormack(n)

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: A math genius works as a financial consultant for criminal organizations in this intelligent thriller. While being investigated by the Treasury Department, he agrees to help an accounting clerk look into fraud at her company, but the assignment will prove far more dangerous than he could have ever anticipated(n)

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: 08-20-2017. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Mr. Woodcock
programme.desc: When an author (Seann William Scott) learns that his mother (Susan Sarandon) is planning on exchanging vows with the high school gym teacher (Billy Bob Thornton) who made his life a living hell, he races home to stop the nuptials from taking place at any cost in this comedy from first-time feature film director Craig Gillespie(n)

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Death Is the Enemy. Jon's mission continues north of the wall, but the odds against his ragged band of misfits may be greater than he imagined(n)

programme.title: Insecure
programme.desc: Hella Shook. Issa tries to build a roster at a work retreat, but butts heads with Frieda. Meanwhile, Molly's day takes an unexpected turn at her parents' vow renewal ceremony; and Lawrence stumbles upon news about Issa(n)

programme.title: Hard Knocks: Training Camp
programme.desc: Episode 2. Jameis Winston works with his receiver tandem; and players and coaches get game-time action vs. the Bengals(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: This spin-off of the Harry Potter franchise jumps back in time to explore the wizarding world of 1926 New York, which is being threatened by both mystical acts of destruction and a group of extremist No-Majs (the American term for Muggles, i.e. those unable to use magic). Author Newt Scamander (Eddie Redmayne) arrives in the city as part of a global study of fantastic beasts, but he gets caught up in this conflict when some of the magical creatures in his care are accidentally released. Katherine Waterston, Alison Sudol, Dan Fogler, Colin Farrell, Ezra Miller, and Johnny Depp co-star in this fantasy adventure, which was directed by David Yates (who helmed four of the Harry Potter films) and adapted for the screen by J.K. Rowling from her own book(n)

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: Lonely kid Nicholas Hoult finds a reluctant father figure in detached bachelor Hugh Grant in this heartwarming comedy based on a book by Nick Hornby(n)

programme.title: Her
programme.desc: Writer Joaquin Phoenix begins a relationship with his hyper-intelligent computer (voiced by Scarlett Johansson). Oscar-winning romance. Strong language/sex/flashing images(n)

programme.title: Emelie
programme.desc: In this tense thriller, two suburban parents hire a new babysitter to look after their three kids while they enjoy a night out, but the sitter eventually reveals herself to be an unhinged imposter who has sinister designs on the family's youngest child(n)

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: Two siblings uncover a harrowing secret about their grandparents while spending a week at their remote Pennsylvania farm(n)

programme.title: Nights in Rodanthe
programme.desc: Escaping a broken marriage, Adrienne Willis travels to the North Carolina town of Rodanthe where a chance meeting with troubled doctor Paul Flanner leads to a life-changing love affair(n)

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: Steve Martin and a top-notch cast star in this seriocomic testament to the joys and perils of raising kids, which chronicles the lives of a quartet of suburban siblings and their families over the course of a single summer(n)

With a little help from James Brown as a revival preacher, the Blues Brothers are divinely inspired to raise the $5,000 that the orphanage needs to stay open(n)

programme.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead
programme.desc: Kids provide for themselves during summer vacation after their babysitter dies(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Now You See Me 2'
programme.desc: A look at "Now You See Me 2," the 2016 sequel to the 2013 thriller that follows the Four Horsemen's return to perform a spectacular stunt in the hopes of clearing their name and exposing the unscrupulous behavior of a tech mogul. The film stars Jesse Eisenberg, Mark Ruffalo and Woody Harrelson, and is directed by Jon M. Chu(n)

programme.title: Nothing but Trouble
programme.desc: Special effects-laden comedy starring Chevy Chase and Demi Moore as a holidaying couple who run into all kinds of trouble in the small town of Valkenvania. Arrested for speeding, the pair are brought up in front of the town's ancient, monstrous judge (played by an unrecognisable Dan Aykroyd), a merciless dispenser of justice who devises a wide array of cruel and unusual punishments for the unfortunate couple(n)

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: When sweet-natured, small-town guy, Longfellow Deeds (Adam Sandler), inherits $40 billion from a deceased uncle, his life changes forever! (2002)(n)

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: A lowly chauffeur of a secret agent is transformed into a crime-fighting superhero when he comes into possession of his boss's gadget-laden tuxedo(n)

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: A hugely successful businesswoman is convicted of insider trading and sentenced to prison. After being released, she tries to earn redemption by helping a group of young girls in their quest to sell brownies(n)

programme.title: Making of 'The Boss'
programme.desc: A look at "The Boss," a 2016 comedy about a successful businesswoman jailed for insider trading who seeks redemption upon her release. The film stars Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Bell and Peter Dinklage, and is directed by Ben Falcone(n)

programme.title: Big Trouble
programme.desc: A chain of events starts with the arrival of a mysterious suitcase in Miami. Arthur Herk, a corrupt business owner, wants to get his hands on the case. At the same time, two hit men want him whacked(n)

programme.title: Defending Your Life
programme.desc: An advertising executive gets into a terrible auto accident and awakens to find himself in heavenly Judgment City. There he learns he must meet with a bureaucratic panel and defend his existence. If he persuades them that he lived a productive life free from unnecessary fear, then he will be admitted into Heaven. If he fails, he must go back to Earth and try again. Since the executive had been a notoriously selfish coward during his earthly existence, he definitely has his work cut out for him(n)

programme.title: Introducing the Dwights
programme.desc: An already-unstable household becomes a virtual battle zone when the son of a risqué comedienne and a has-been singer finds mom meddling in his love life in director Cherie Nowlan's dysfunctional romantic comedy. Twenty-one-year-old Tim Dwight (Khan Chittenden) comes from a peculiar family; his mother, Jean (Brenda Blethyn), is a bawdy stage comic renowned for her scatological sense of humor and his father, John (Frankie J. Holden), is a faded country-music star who now works as a low-rent security guard. While dad is busy trying to revive his flat-lined career, mom spends most of her time doting on Tim and his developmentally disabled brother, Mark (Richard Wilson). Upon meeting the beautiful Jill (Emma Booth), Tim believes his may have finally found the woman of his dreams. Unfortunately in Jean's eyes there is only room for one woman in Tim's life, and that woman is his mother. As Tim's relationship with Jill grows increasingly serious, the stage is set for a battle royal between the woman who once gave him life and the prospective mother of his future children(n)

programme.title: Almost Christmas
programme.desc: An African-American widower asks his family to join him for their first Christmas since his wife passed away. However, having all of them under one roof leads to a number of personal confrontations as secrets are revealed and marriages are tested(n)

programme.title: Silicon Valley
programme.desc: Success Failure. In the Season 4 premiere, the guys struggle to find funding for Pied Piper's video-chat app to keep up with their rapidly growing user base. Meanwhile, Erlich encounters resistance from Big Head's dad; Gavin clashes with Jack Barker at Hooli; and Richard hatches a revolutionary idea that could change his future(n)

programme.title: Silicon Valley
programme.desc: Terms of Service. Richard clashes with Dinesh when the latter's new position goes to his head(n)

programme.title: Silicon Valley
programme.desc: Intellectual Property. Richard pushes himself to the brink of sanity while trying to move ahead with his next big idea; Erlich finds Jian-Yang unwilling to help with his comeback; Monica sets a trap at Raviga to improve her standing with Laurie; Dinesh goes on a date; Big Head enters the world of academia; Gavin's future is suddenly uncertain(n)

programme.title: Silicon Valley
programme.desc: Teambuilding Exercise. Jared worries about Richard when he reaches out to an unlikely ally; Gilfoyle gets serious about security after Dinesh's latest dalliance; Erlich grows concerned about Jian-Yang's commitment to his app(n)

programme.title: Silicon Valley
programme.desc: The Blood Boy. Richard's latest partnership begins to crumble when he has to deal with an unexpected interloper. Meanwhile, Dinesh looks for a way out of his new relationship; and Monica faces a business dilemma after learning of surprising developments at Raviga(n)

programme.title: Silicon Valley
programme.desc: Customer Service. A hunt for financial support takes Richard outside the tech bubble, where he encounters a contentious figure from Pied Piper's past(n)

programme.title: Silicon Valley
programme.desc: The Patent Troll. Richard decides to stand up to a patent troll, but his defiance comes back to haunt him; Gilfoyle goes to extremes to battle Jian-Yang's new smart fridge; Jared embraces multiple identities in an effort to reduce costs; Erlich mixes with a group of alpha males(n)

programme.title: Silicon Valley
programme.desc: The Keenan Vortex. Richard ponders a deal with the tech world's latest "it" boy; Jack faces setbacks(n)

programme.title: Silicon Valley
programme.desc: Hooli-Con. Erlich goes on a trip to get his mojo back while the guys head to Hooli-Con, where Jared faces a moral dilemma; Gilfoyle and Dinesh are distracted by Keenan; and Richard becomes obsessed with an ex's new beau(n)

programme.title: Silicon Valley
programme.desc: Server Error. In the Series 4 finale, Richard's caught in a web of lies in a last-ditch attempt to save Pied Piper. Meanwhile, Jared plans his exit when he's worried about Richard's future; Jack tries to change the narrative; and Gavin plots his comeback(n)

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.sub-title: Al Franken; Penn Jillette; Amy Holmes; Gavin Newsom
programme.desc: Al Franken; Penn Jillette; Amy Holmes; Gavin Newsom. Sen. Al Franken (D-Minn.) and magician Penn Jillette are the interview guests. The panelists are political analyst Amy Holmes and California lieutenant governor Gavin Newsom(n)

programme.title: Renaissance Man
programme.desc: An out-of-work exec reluctantly takes a job teaching English to a group of underachieving Army recruits to help them complete basic training. He bonds with them by introducing them to Shakespeare, and clashes with an unimpressed Drill Sergeant(n)

programme.title: Continental Divide
programme.desc: Cynical reporter Ernie is sent out of town by his editor when one of his investigations ends in death threats. So he's dispatched to interview an eagle conservationist in the mountains(n)

programme.title: Ready to Rumble
programme.desc: Two dimwit sewage workers watch their hero, WCW wrestler Jimmy King get screwed out of the World title by wrestler Diamond Dallas Page and evil WCW owner Titus Sinclair. They embark on a quest to help their hero win his title - and honour back. Features cameos by lots of WCW wrestlers(n)

programme.title: Catch Me if You Can
programme.desc: Teenage fraudster Frank Abagnale Jr takes on various identities in order to cash fake cheques worth over $2.5m. But his outlandish scheme soon catches the eye of the FBI(n)

programme.title: Now You See Me 2
programme.desc: The Four Horsemen return to clear their names with one last spectacular stunt and at the same time expose the unethical practices of a tech mogul(n)

programme.title: The Big Lebowski
programme.desc: A slacker gets mixed up in a kidnapping plot involving an eccentric millionaire with whom he shares the same name(n)

programme.title: Welcome Home Roscoe Jenkins
programme.desc: Martin Lawrence stars in this uproarious farce about a successful self-help guru and TV talk-show host who finds himself embroiled in a series of comic disasters when he goes home to Georgia for his parents' 50th wedding anniversary. James Earl Jones, Margaret Avery, Joy Bryant, Cedric the Entertainer. Written and directed by Malcolm D. Lee(n)

programme.title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
programme.desc: A hugely popular rapper faces a career meltdown when his latest album tanks and his attempts to rehab his image only end in disaster. In time, he considers reuniting with his old rap trio, the Style Boyz(n)

programme.title: What Women Want
programme.desc: Chauvinistic Nick Marshall is disgusted when he loses out in the race for the top job to female Darcy Maguire. But a curious accident forces him to mend his ways when he realises he can hear what women are really thinking. A modern comedy with a nice 50s feel(n)

programme.title: The Big Lebowski
programme.desc: A slacker gets mixed up in a kidnapping plot involving an eccentric millionaire with whom he shares the same name(n)

programme.title: Martin Lawrence Live: Runteldat
programme.desc: Martin Lawrence is one of America's top black comedians, spoken of in the same breath as the late Richard Pryor and Eddie Murphy when they were at the height of their stand-up powers, and he's also appeared in films including Big Momma's House and Bad Boys. But he's also suffered setbacks in his personal life, from being arrested with a loaded gun at an airport to being accused by his co-star in the TV show Martin of sexual harassment. In this outstanding film of his stand-up routine, he confronts his demons and those who demonise him, as well as veering off to his favourite subject: women, and how hard they are to live with. And 'rundletat' is short for 'run and tell that'(n)

programme.title: Welcome Home Roscoe Jenkins
programme.desc: Martin Lawrence stars in this uproarious farce about a successful self-help guru and TV talk-show host who finds himself embroiled in a series of comic disasters when he goes home to Georgia for his parents' 50th wedding anniversary. programme.title: Selena
programme.desc: Jennifer Lopez stars in this true story of Texas born singer Selena Quintanilla-Perez, who rose from cult status to becoming one of the biggest stars in Latin Music(n)

programme.title: Bratz: The Movie
programme.desc: Four teenage girls try to remain best friends forever and reject snooty cliques as they begin high school together in this family film, based on the popular line of dolls, that's filled with fun, fashion and music. Logan Browning, Janel Parrish, Nathalia Ramos, Skyler Shaye, Chelsea Staub. Directed by Sean McNamara(n)

programme.title: El Perro y el Gato
programme.desc: The Adventure Begins/La aventura comienza. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: A Little Curious

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: This spin-off of the Harry Potter franchise jumps back in time to explore the wizarding world of 1926 New York, which is being threatened by both mystical acts of destruction and a group of extremist No-Majs (the American term for Muggles, i.e. those unable to use magic). Author Newt Scamander (Eddie Redmayne) arrives in the city as part of a global study of fantastic beasts, but he gets caught up in this conflict when some of the magical creatures in his care are accidentally released. Katherine Waterston, Alison Sudol, Dan Fogler, Colin Farrell, Ezra Miller, and Johnny Depp co-star in this fantasy adventure, which was directed by David Yates (who helmed four of the Harry Potter films) and adapted for the screen by J.K. Rowling from her own book(n)

programme.title: The Secret Life of Bees
programme.desc: Gina Prince-Bythewood's adaptation of Sue Monk Kidd's novel The Secret Life of Bees stars Dakota Fanning as Lily, a 14-year-old growing up in a small Southern town in 1964. She is haunted by memories of shooting her mother when she was a young girl. Lily lives with her emotionally distant father, and her best friend is their African-American housekeeper Rosaleen (Jennifer Hudson). After locals beat Rosaleen for attempting to register as a voter, and Lily's dad goes one step too far during an argument with his daughter, Lily and Rosaleen set out to find the place where the only picture Lily has of her mother was taken. That place turns out to be the home of the independent Boatwright sisters, a trio -- Queen Latifah, Sophie Okonedo, and Alicia Keys -- who make a very successful living producing honey. Lily and her friend move in with them, and soon the girl learns about both beekeeping and life(n)

programme.title: Inkheart

Brendan Fraser stars as a book collector who, along with his 12-year-old daughter (Eliza Hope Bennett), has the ability to bring fictional book characters to life, among them a nasty fairy-tale villain who wants to use their powers for his own evil doings. Helen Mirren, Paul Bettany, Andy Serkis. Directed by Iain Softley. The film is adapted from the kid-lit favorite by Cornelia Funke(n)

programme.desc: When Dave (Jason Lee) introduces Alvin, Simon, and Theodore to his new girlfriend Samantha (Kimberly Williams-Paisley) and her troublemaking son Miles (Josh Green), the chipmunks begin to panic at the thought of Dave proposing to her while on a trip to Miami. Fearing that they will be sent back to the forest if the relationship becomes too serious, the three decide to head to Florida to stop the proposal. Luckily, Miles isn't thrilled with the idea of having a stepfather, so he decides to accompany them on their zany road trip. Justin Long, Matthew Gray Gubler, and Jesse McCartney provide the voices of the chipmunks. Bella Thorne and Tony Hale co-star. Directed by Walt Becker(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Sharkboy and Lavagirl
programme.desc: Writer and director Robert Rodriguez returns to the family-friendly adventure of his Spy Kids movies with this three-dimensional action opus. Max (Cayden Boyd) is a ten-year-old boy who doesn't get along with his peers and is constantly bullied at school. But Max has an active imagination, and he has a pair of very special imaginary playmates -- Shark Boy (Taylor Lautner), a human-shark half-breed cared for by a pack of great whites, and Lava Girl (Taylor Dooley), a girl with superpowers who can conjure heat and fire at will. Max may be a creative boy, but what he doesn't know is that Shark Boy and Lava Girl really do exist, and he is recruited to help them as they do battle against Mr. Electricity, a super-villain determined to deprive children of their sleep. Shot and originally released in the 3-D format, The Adventures of Shark Boy and Lava Girl also stars David Arquette and Kristin Davis as Max's parents, and George Lopez as a schoolteacher; writer and director Rodriguez wrote the film's story in collaboration with his then seven-year-old son, Racer Rodriguez(n)

programme.title: Casper
programme.desc: Based on the popular cartoon character, this family-oriented "ghost story" is about a not-so-scary spirit who bonds with a little girl (Christina Ricci). The eternally irritable Ms. Carrigan (Cathy Moriarty) discovers that the only thing she's been left in her recently departed father's will is a rickety old house in New England. Naturally, the woman is furious about this, until her "close personal friend" and assistant, Dibbs (Eric Idle of Monty Python fame), discovers a secret message that a treasure may be concealed somewhere in the house. The two take off for Maine, only to learn that the house is haunted by Casper "the friendly ghost" and his three ghostly uncles Stinky, Stretch, and Fatso. After futilely recruiting an exorcist (Don Novello, more or less reviving his Father Guido Sarducci character from Saturday Night Live) and a "professional ghost exterminator" (Dan Aykroyd), she brings in a "ghost psychiatrist" (Bill Pullman) and his daughter Kat (Ricci). Innocently attracted to the young girl, Casper befriends Kat as they try to save the ghosts' home from the evil Carrigan. Eye-popping special effects highlight this magical story that touches (albeit lightly) on the theme of what lies at the heart of human desires. Clint Eastwood, Rodney Dangerfield, Mel Gibson and The Crypt Keeper (of Tales from the Crypt) all make cameos as apparitions in the mirror Bill Pullman looks into in the house(n)

programme.title: Notorious
programme.desc: Jamal Woolard stars in George Tillman Jr's biopic of Brooklyn rapper Biggie Smalls, aka The Notorious B.I.G. (and better know by his mother Voletta - who co-produced the movie - as Christopher Wallace). Early on, the young Smalls shows interest in writing and performing rap with his friends, but he drifts into a life of drug dealing instead. Smalls' fortunes look to improve when a demo tape of his music is noticed by big-time producer Sean Combs (who also co-produced the movie, and is played by Derek Luke). Combs signs the rapper to his Uptown Records label, on the understanding that Smalls will forsake his narcotics activities. Director Tillman Jr goes on to track the nascent recording star's trajectory from this promising start, through his constant philandering, his love/ hate relationship with West Coast rapper Tupac Shakur and on to the bitter, ultimately homicidal, rivalry between the East and West Coast rap scenes, which was to bring to an abrupt, permanent end to both men's careers. Also starring Angela Bassett(n)

programme.title: Loving

The Lovings decided to fight back, and their case led to a landmark Supreme Court decision that struck down laws prohibiting interracial marriage(n)

programme.title: Grumpier Old Men
programme.desc: Things don't seem to change much in Wabasha County: Max and John are still fighting after 35 years, Grandpa still drinks, smokes, and chases women, and nobody's been able to catch the fabled "Catfish Hunter", a gigantic catfish that actually smiles at fishermen who try to snare it. Six months ago John married the new girl in town (Ariel), and people begin to suspect that Max might be missing something similar in his life. The only joy Max claims is left in his life is fishing, but that might change with the new owner of the bait shop(n)

programme.title: Little Nicky
programme.desc: The Lord of Darkness wants to retire but none of his three sons seems good enough for the job. When he decides he will not cede his throne to any of them, the two most powerful ones escape to Earth to create a kingdom for themselves. This action closes the portal filtering sinful souls to Hell and causes Satan to begin withering away. Now it's up to the weak but beloved Nicky to save his dad and the humankind before one of his brothers becomes the new Satan(n)

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: Old-fashioned, melodramatic love story in which a singing superstar takes on a bodyguard to defend her against someone who is trying to kill her. Sparks fly when the feisty singer and her uncompromising protector cannot see eye to eye about anything, but the friction also kindles romance. Whitney Houston's debut film role. With a clutch of hits including 'I Will Always Love You'(n)

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: Years after leaving the jungle and settling down with his wife Jane in London, Tarzan returns to the Congo to act as a trade representative for England. However, he soon clashes with a greedy Belgian captain who has sinister plans for his old home(n)

programme.title: The Breakfast Club
programme.desc: Forced to spend a Saturday detention in school, five disparate high school kids find that they have more in common than they ever realized. Romantic comedy drama staring Emilio Estevez. (1985)(n)

programme.title: Interview With the Vampire
programme.desc: A sombre vampire mesmerises a young reporter with the story of his ghastly transformation from grieving aristocrat to immortal monster, beginning in 18th-century New Orleans with his first encounters with the charismatic and decadent bloodsucker Lestat. The two vamps remain deeply, if reluctantly, connected over the years, while becoming intimately involved with others of their kind(n)

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.sub-title: Al Franken; Penn Jillette; Amy Holmes; Gavin Newsom
programme.desc: Al Franken; Penn Jillette; Amy Holmes; Gavin Newsom. Sen. Al Franken (D-Minn.) and magician Penn Jillette are the interview guests. The panelists are political analyst Amy Holmes and California lieutenant governor Gavin Newsom(n)

programme.title: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
programme.desc: Writer-director Andrew Dominik's thoughtful, elegiac saga is a dead-on throwback to classic Westerns of yore. Brad Pitt gives a bang-up performance as the notorious outlaw living out his final days in 1882 before being gunned down by a member of his gang (Casey Affleck). Features a cameo by political pundit James Carville as Governor Crittenden and rocker Nick Cave as a saloon singer. Cave also co-wrote the score. Actor-playwright Sam Shepard costars as Jesse's brother Frank(n)

programme.title: Rules Don't Apply
programme.desc: In 1958 Hollywood, a romance blossoms between a pious actress and a right-wing chauffeur—even though both of them work for reclusive billionaire Howard Hughes, who forbids his employees to date each other. Their secret liaison plays out while Hughes' aviation innovations keep pace with his debilitating eccentricities(n)

programme.title: Down With Love
programme.desc: Best-selling author Barbara urges girls to throw down their aprons and take control. So sneaky journo Catcher tries to romance her and then show her up(n)

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: The Huntsman and his secret lover Sara attempt to stop Freya the Ice Queen and her evil sister from conquering the forest(n)

programme.title: Search Party
programme.desc: Distraught over the realisation that they scared away their best friend's fiancée, hard-partying pals Evan and Jason set out on a wild journey to reunite the estranged couple by any means necessary(n)

programme.title: Mystic River
programme.desc: Childhood friends Jimmy, Sean and Dave are reunited by a tragedy involving one of their children. As homicide detective Sean investigates, Jimmy enlists his relatives to launch their own inquiry. Later, suspicions fall on Jimmy and Sean's old friend Dave(n)

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Exuberant musical based on the hit stage show featuring the music of ABBA. 20-year-old Sophie lives on an idyllic Greek island with her free-spirited mother Donna. When Sophie gets engaged to her boyfriend, she decides that she wants her father at her wedding - but unfortunately, she does not know who her father is. She takes matters into her own hands and invites the three possible candidates to the wedding, without the knowledge of her mother. Will Donna reveal who Sophie's real dad is? And is she as reluctant to see her former lovers as she claims?(n)

programme.title: Serendipity
programme.desc: Sara and Jonathan meet, by chance, while shopping for gloves in New York. At the end of the evening Jonathan is in love, but Sara leaves him by cab, saying that if they are meant to be together, fate will find a way. Years later, as both are ready to marry different partners, destiny does indeed seem to conspire to rekindle their love(n)

programme.title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
programme.desc: Back in the late 1970s, author Cameron Crowe banked upon his youthful appearance to pose as a teen-aged high school student. The results of his hands-on research was the revelatory book Fast Times at Ridgemont High, which went on to spectacular success as a theatrical feature. The sociological inner lining of Crowe's book was sacrificed in favor of standard teen-movie dialogue and Animal House-style comedy, but the film is impossible to dislike, and it spawned a legion of future imitators. Ostensibly, the main characters are brother and sister Jennifer Jason Leigh and Judge Reinhold. However, the real breakthrough star is Sean Penn as the perpetually zoned-out Jeff Spicoli. It is Penn who has the film's most famous scene, wherein the decorum of teacher Hand (Ray Walston)'s classroom is interrupted by a pizza delivery. Fast Times at Ridgemont High was spun off into a TV series, the short-lived 1986 weekly Fast Times(n)

programme.title: Term Life
programme.desc: A professional thief takes his estranged daughter on the lam when a job goes awry. As crooks and corrupt cops close in on them, he also takes out a life-insurance policy on himself in an effort to leave something behind for his daughter(n)

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: Batman and Superman clash over differing philosophies about what kind of heroism is needed to protect the world in this soaring comic-book extravaganza. However, the duo are soon forced to confront an even greater threat created by Lex Luthor(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.sub-title: Women Behind Bars & The Business of Making Art
programme.desc: Women Behind Bars & The Business of Making Art. Isobel Yeung reports on the increase of incarcerated women in U.S.; Ben Anderson examines the threat of forgeries in the art world(n)

programme.title: Brillo Box (3 ¢ off)
programme.desc: This documentary short traces the history of a sculpture of a Brillo Box by Andy Warhol, from its purchase by a couple in 1969 to its three-million-dollar auction in 2010. Directed by Lisanne Skyler(n)

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Death Is the Enemy. Jon's mission continues north of the wall, but the odds against his ragged band of misfits may be greater than he imagined(n)

programme.title: The Conjuring
programme.desc: A demonic entity lays claim to family living in a secluded farmhouse, prompting them to seek the aid of two renowned paranormal researchers in this tale of possession inspired by actual events. The story gets underway as paranormal researchers Ed (Patrick Wilson) and Lorraine Warren (Vera Farmiga) evaluate a mysterious doll discovered by a trio of young roommates in 1968. Believing their house to be haunted by the wayward spirit of a deceased young girl, they give the girl permission to inhabit the doll, and soon their lives become a waking nightmare. Informed by Ed and Lorraine that they have fallen victim to an inhuman spirit (aka a demon) seeking a human host, the roommates entrust the doll to the Warrens, who place it in their personal museum for safekeeping. Flash forward three years to Harrisville, RI, where the Perron family have just moved into their country dream home -- an 18th century farmhouse that offers plenty of space for parents Carolyn (Lili Taylor) and Roger (Ron Livingston), as well as their five daughters Andrea (Shanley Caswell), Nancy (Hayley McFarland), Christine (Joey King), Cindy (Mackenzie Foy), and April (Kyla Deaver). It seems like the ideal place to raise a family until a series of unsettling events leave the Perron family convinced they are not alone. Terrified, Carolyn reaches out to the Warrens for help, and learns that a demonic entity has attached itself to her family, and has no intentions of letting them go. Meanwhile, the deeper the Warrens delve into the farmhouse's history, the clearer it becomes that this spirit has a murderous agenda, and that no one will be safe until it is driven back into darkness(n)

programme.title: Columbo

programme.title: The Rockford Files
programme.desc: The Kirkoff Case. The first "official" case for private detective Jim Rockford (James Garner)--that is, the first case on the TV-series version of The Rockford Files, rather than the 1974 TV-movie pilot--finds him typically championing the underdog. In this instance, that "underdog" is not some impoverished wretch, but instead the fabulously wealthy Larry Kirkoff (played by a pre-stardom James Woods), heir to a family fortune. Suspected of murdering his parents to get their money, Kirkoff hires Jimbo to prove his innocence, and to nail the guilty party, who may or may not have been the respective ex-lovers of his late mom and dad. Unfortunately, there are some extremely tough characters around and about who'd prefer that Larry remain under suspicion(n)

programme.title: The Rockford Files
programme.desc: The Dark and Bloody Ground. Detective drama series. Private eye Jim Rockford is hired by a lawyer who convinces him that she did not kill her screenwriter husband. While investigating, Jim realises that he has become a target for would-be assassins(n)

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Mr. Monk Meets the Playboy. A secretary hires Adrian to help prove her boss was murdered - even though he died alone in a room locked from the inside. programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Mr. Monk and the 12th Man. Monk is on a mission to find the connection between a serial killer's eleven unlikely victims before anyone else is murdered(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Mr. Monk and the Paperboy. Adrian Monk is a highly gifted detective whose career is jeopardised by his overwhelming fear of germs, crowds, small places, and almost everything else...(although he's making progress on milk). Monk's disorder was triggered by the murder of his beloved wife, Trudy, which continues to haunt him as the only unsolved mystery in his career. Ordered to take a leave of absence from the police department, Monk hires Sharona, a nurse who helps him try to get reinstated on the force, and in the process, becomes an unlikely Dr. Watson to his Sherlock Holmes. When the police department find themselves unable to crack a high-profile case, they have no choice but to bring back the only man for the job...phobias and all(n)

programme.title: Stand by Me
programme.desc: Based on the Stephen King short story The Body, Rob Reiner's easygoing nostalgia piece is set in Castle Rock, OR, over Labor Day weekend, 1959. A quartet of boys, inseparable friends all, set out in search of a dead body that one of the boys overhears his brother talking about. The foursome consists of intellectual Gordie (Wil Wheaton), born leader Chris (River Phoenix), emotionally disturbed Teddy (Corey Feldman), and chubby hanger-on Vern (Jerry O'Connell). The boys' adventures en route to the elusive body are colored by the personal pressures brought to bear on all of them by the adult world. Richard Dreyfuss, playing the grown-up Gordie, narrates the film, while Kiefer Sutherland dominates every scene he's in as a brutish high-school bully(n)

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: Set in the snowy landscape of Fargo, Minnesota, this strange tale is as much a character study as an intricate crime drama. A bumbling car salesman hires two idiots to kidnap his wife. The kidnaping goes horribly wrong, and a deceptively simple, pregnant policewoman must apprehend the criminals(n)

programme.title: Haunter
programme.desc: A teenage ghost teams up with a living girl to stop a phantom killer, and break a vicious supernatural cycle in this psychological horror tale from director Vincenzo Natali (Cube, Splice). Lisa Johnson (Abigail Breslin) was just one day shy of 16 when her entire family perished back in 1986. Ever since, the spirits of the young girl and her family have been trapped reliving the monotonous routine of their last day alive. Meanwhile, in the present day, young Olivia (Eleanor Zichy) moves into the Johnson's old house with her family, and bears witness to a disturbing transformation; her typically loving father is acting like a man possessed, prompting the startled teen to fear for her family's safety. Later, after failing to break through to her own family, Lisa manages to communicate with Olivia, and makes a shocking discovery: The house was once owned by a notorious serial killer who preyed on young girls (Stephen McHattie). Although dead, the madman has summoned the power to possess the living, and now dwells in the body of Olivia's father. Now, should the two girls fail to manage to stop the killer soon, the worst may be yet to come(n)

programme.title: Silent Hill: Revelation 3D
programme.desc: In this visionary horror film, a teenager searches for her missing father in Silent Hill and encounters a world of nightmares as she races to rescue him from the dark forces that threaten them both(n)

programme.title: Red Dragon
programme.desc: After the successful The Silence of the Lambs and Hannibal, Anthony Hopkins once again plays the perverse, cunning killer Hannibal Lecter in this prequel based on the homonymous book by Thomas Harris. Will Graham (Edward Norton) is an FBI investigator, an expert in analizing the minds and procedures of serial killers. After the dangerous arrest of Dr. Hannibal Lecter (Hopkins), Graham decides to end his career as a federal agent to retire and rest in Florida with his wife Molly (Mary-Louise Parker) and their son. However, the sudden appearance of a sadistic murderer known as Tooth Fairy (Ralph Fiennes), leads the investigator to be summoned again by his mentor, Jack Crawford (Harvey Keitel) to catch the criminal. Due to the extreme complexity of the case, Graham goes to Lecter himself for help. Trusting this sinister murderer does not seem to be quite the right thing to do, determined as he is to toy with the fate of the agent and his family. Emily Watson rounds off the multi-star cast of this distressing psychological thriller directed by Brett Ratner, who masterfully applied the exact doses of suspense and horror to the story(n)

Ben Fogle heads to the Exmoor coast and the picturesque village of Porlock, where he samples the locally farmed oysters that are making a comeback. Plus, the programme revisits Britain's biggest farming family, the Owens in the Yorkshire Dales, to see how baby number nine Nancy is settling in.(n)

Meanwhile, back in the UK, cadet Sophie learns how to deal with G-forces, and the training captains prepare to head to France to show off their experience to seven rookies.(n)

programme.desc: The actor begins the next part of his journey on Mundoo Island, which has provided shelter and a way of life for five generations of one farming family. Martin Clunes joins Colin and Sally Grundy for a day of cattle mustering. He also explores Phillip Island, one of Australia's favourite playgrounds, then heads south to King Island, in the blustery Bass Strait between Tasmania and mainland Australia. Martin completes his odyssey with a visit to see one of the region's most iconic creatures, the Tasmanian Devil. Last in the series.(n)

programme.desc: Part one of two. Pop befriends a pilot he rescues from his crashed plane, but suspects he is being drawn into a smuggling racket when the family is invited to a celebratory champagne night on the town. Drama, starring David Jason.(n)

programme.title: You're Only Young Twice
programme.desc: Flora's patriotism comes to the fore on St George's Day, but she has a fight on her hands when Miss Finch tries to ban her exhibition.(n)

programme.title: On the Buses
programme.desc: Beryl describes her ideal man, leaving Arthur dejected because he does not even begin to measure up. Reg Varney stars.(n)

programme.title: Rising Damp
programme.desc: Rigsby discovers there is a new man in Miss Jones's life and decides to declare his feelings for her - but his romantic gesture comes too late. Classic comedy, starring Leonard Rossiter, Frances de la Tour, Richard Beckinsale and Don Warrington.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Clare finds herself under suspicion when a wild party ends in tragedy with a drugs-related death, and David is put in a tricky situation when his Aunty Peggy arrives in Aidensfield and sets up an illegal vodka still.(n)

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Four sisters claim their father died on a boat trip during a storm, but with their stories changing constantly, Jessica's suspicions grow and she tries to ascertain whether they are guilty of killing him to benefit from a $100million inheritance. Drama, starring Angela Lansbury, Tom Bosley and Howard Duff.(n)

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When director Nick Cheyney is found beheaded by a guillotine on the set of his latest film, Barnaby and Jones are left with no shortage of suspects. The victim, it transpires, was on poor terms with several people in some way connected to the project, including the mother of his child, and an actor who blamed him for ruining his career. Guest starring Nicky Henson.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: UK
programme.desc: When a toddler goes missing from a high-street merry-go-round, his distraught mother reports him kidnapped and a massive police hunt is launched to track him down. However, with more than one suspect and no physical evidence, the search throws up more questions than answers - especially as the boy's mum seems to be hiding something. Crime drama, starring Bradley Walsh and Jamie Bamber.(n)

programme.title: The Street
programme.desc: Joseph Mawle plays a racist chef forced to confront his hatred of ethnic minorities when a friend asks him to take the credit for saving a Polish girl from a fire. Despite a lifetime of casually blaming immigrants for all life's ills, he finds himself getting close to the child's destitute mother - and even invites her into his home. Also starring Steve Marsh, Julia Krynke and Tanya Moodie.(n)

programme.title: Mrs Biggs
programme.desc: Charmian gets used to her role as a single mother in Melbourne, but tragedy strikes when eldest son Nicky is killed in a car accident. Distraught, but determined to remain strong, she uses his death as motivation to pursue one of her dreams. Meanwhile, Ronnie descends into a life of debauchery and one of his Brazilian conquests reveals she is pregnant with his child. Realising this could be the ticket to a legitimate right to remain in Rio, he asks Charmian for a divorce, and she agrees - on the understanding they will reunite at a later stage. However, as Ronnie grows increasingly distant, she is forced into making a life-changing decision. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Rising Damp
programme.desc: Rigsby challenges Philip to a boxing match, convinced Miss Jones will throw herself at his feet if he wins. Leonard Rossiter, Frances de la Tour, Richard Beckinsale and Don Warrington star.(n)

programme.title: ITV3 Nightscreen
programme.desc: Text-based information service.(n)

programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: The hospital staff are pushed to their limits when an amusement arcade collapses. In the search for survivors, a child is found with a suspected blood-clotting disorder and the team must find his mother to obtain his medical history. Stella enters the wreckage to free a girl who is trapped under a fruit machine, but when she becomes blocked in, Frankie tries to save her - and declares his feelings in the process. Medical drama, starring Natalie Anderson and Scott Taylor.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat

programme.title: Where the Heart Is
programme.desc: Karen is subjected to a horrific assault by the grandson of a pensioner in her care, while Luke gets into trouble at school and responds by running away, plunging Anna into a panic. On a happier note, Tom clinches an important business deal with German client Herr Gruber, while Joe contemplates moving in with Beth. Leslie Ash, Julian Lewis Jones and Lesley Dunlop star.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A crime wave hits Ashfordly train station as a number of freight wagons mysteriously vanish, giving the police a tricky case to crack, but a sandwich could provide a vital clue. Peggy has plans to make some fast money when she decides to play dirty in the local bowls tournament, while a night out in Whitby proves eventful for Walker and Helen. Rural drama, starring Gwen Taylor, Jonathan Kerrigan and Sophie Ward.(n)

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: As the staff come to terms with the recent tragic events, new ambulance driver Bobby makes a dramatic entrance. Marian finds herself a partner for the gig by Alun's band - but the evening ends in chaos when a fire breaks out at the overcrowded club. Up on the moors, a shooting incident leaves Ormerod and Bobby in danger and the mountain rescue team is called out to an elderly lady lying wounded outside her decaying farmhouse. Guest starring former Coronation Street star Sean Wilson.(n)

programme.title: The Darling Buds of May
programme.sub-title: A Season of Heavenly Gifts - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Pop's hoard of cash causes trouble for the family when Marcus Cope resolves to stop Charley buying the hop garden at any cost. Montgomery is unhappy at naval college and the Brigadier's solution provides a challenge for Pop.(n)

programme.title: You're Only Young Twice
programme.desc: Some of the residents at Paradise Lodge have a mild flutter at pontoon, while Cissie experiences a real daylight robbery.(n)

programme.title: On the Buses
programme.desc: Stan splashes out on a new colour television for the family, but has problems disposing of the old one. Vintage comedy, starring Reg Varney.(n)

programme.title: Rising Damp
programme.desc: A smooth-talking new tenant called Seymour, whose aristocratic veneer conceals the soul of an out-and-out crook, tries to con Rigsby out of his life savings. Classic comedy, with Leonard Rossiter and Henry McGee.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A crime wave hits Ashfordly train station as a number of freight wagons mysteriously vanish, giving the police a tricky case to crack, but a sandwich could provide a vital clue. Peggy has plans to make some fast money when she decides to play dirty in the local bowls tournament, while a night out in Whitby proves eventful for Walker and Helen. Rural drama, starring Gwen Taylor, Jonathan Kerrigan and Sophie Ward.(n)

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Jessica travels to San Francisco for her niece's wedding, but finds herself trying to prove the groom innocent of murder when he is accused of killing his boss, who had been refusing to pay him. Drama, starring Angela Lansbury, Jeff Conaway and Martin Landau.(n)

programme.title: Heathrow: Britain's Busiest Airport
programme.desc: Storm Imogen causes chaos on the runways and in the terminals, with airside safety officer Simon keeping his eyes peeled for any potentially dangerous debris that could damage the landing planes. In Terminal 4, manager Sunita looks after dozens of passengers whose flight to Delhi has been cancelled, while trainee engineer Elliot prepares to get his hands dirty as he clears a blocked sewage pit - an essential part of the airport's operations that no passenger normally sees. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Paul O'Grady's Animal Orphans
programme.desc: In his final week in Africa, the comedian and presenter visits Bambelela, a rehabilitation centre for orphaned vervet monkeys, where he looks after 10-month-old Toledo for the day. Returning to Moholoholo Wildlife Rehabilitation Centre, Paul discovers what it's like to be a volunteer, from the daily walk through the Bush, to cleaning the enclosures and encountering the smelliest animal at the facility, a honey badger called Julius. After that, he heads to Hoedspruit Endangered Species Centre to meet Little G, an orphaned rhino who has been given a permanent companion, a sheep named Lamby. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: UK
programme.desc: The start of a shooting rampage through the streets of London leaves a nightclub peppered with bullets and two revellers dead. With the media swarming all over the case and a hostage to track down, Brooks and Devlin race against the clock to find the duo responsible for the massacre, but their defence barrister (Lesley Manville) claims one of them was more innocent victim than violent killer. With Brooke Kinsella.(n)

programme.title: Cold Blood
programme.desc: One-off crime drama, featuring the return of sinister serial killer Brian Wicklow. When a prison inmate is hanged in his cell with the murderer present, he immediately falls under suspicion. However, things are never as they appear with the wily criminal, and the police once again turn to his former cellmate Jake Osbourne to gain an insight into Wicklow's chilling mind. Starring Matthew Kelly and John Hannah.(n)

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents as four contestants pit their wits against ruthless quiz genius the Chaser in the hope of winning a potential prize pot worth thousands of pounds. They work as a team and play strategically to answer general knowledge questions against the clock and race down the game board to the exit without being caught.(n)

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: In Las Colinas, Mary tries new ways of showing she is bidding, while Ricky and Bubba discover a spray gun.(n)

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: Simon Templar sets out on the trail of a former Nazi believed to have taken refuge in South America. Vintage drama, guest starring Francesca Annis, Roger Delgado, John Barrie and Maurice Kaufmann.(n)

programme.title: Ironside
programme.desc: Part one of two. The consultant detective gets personally involved when an old flame reports her daughter has been kidnapped. Drama, starring Raymond Burr, with guests Vera Miles and Cloris Leachman.(n)

programme.title: Quincy ME
programme.desc: Forensic evidence suggests an influential businessman killed his estranged wife - but Quincy has a hard time convincing the police that such a respectable figure could be capable of murdering anyone. Drama, starring Jack Klugman and Garry Walberg.(n)

programme.title: Minder
programme.desc: Arthur spies a business opportunity as he and Ray prepare to pay their respects to the late Charlie Johnson, but the deceased's widow has other ideas. Comedy drama, starring George Cole and Gary Webster.(n)

programme.title: The Professionals
programme.desc: Bodie's schoolteacher girlfriend seeks CI5's assistance to quash a drug-smuggling ring after learning a 14-year-old pupil is involved having used then hidden a discarded firearm. The body count soon increases at an alarming rate as potential witnesses to a crime are killed off by the ruthless gang. Lewis Collins, Martin Shaw and Celia Gregory star.(n)

programme.title: Cycling: Vuelta a Espana
programme.desc: Action from the second stage of this year's race, which featured a 201km journey from Nimes to Gruissan, Grand Narbonne in France.(n)

programme.title: Ironside
programme.desc: Part two of two. The San Francisco detective continues his investigations into the kidnap of an ex-girlfriend's daughter. With guest star Vera Miles.(n)

programme.title: Quincy ME
programme.desc: An eccentric millionaire is murdered in his lavish penthouse suite, presenting Quincy with a fresh mystery to solve - how the killer was able to bypass a supposedly foolproof security system. Drama, starring Jack Klugman.(n)

programme.title: Minder
programme.desc: Arthur gives up smoking and drinking on doctor's orders, and soon appears to lose his grip on reality, demanding the police protect him from an apparently non-existent angry customer. George Cole and Gary Webster star.(n)

programme.title: The Professionals
programme.desc: A crooked foreign diplomat helps arrange the theft of a consignment of silver bullion being transported through Tilbury docks. Bodie and Doyle are assigned to investigate, and it becomes apparent that they have a useful link to the villains via Doyle's girlfriend Deborah. Drama, starring Martin Shaw and Lewis Collins.(n)

programme.title: Storage Wars: Texas
programme.desc: Victor battles to end his losing streak in Waxahachie, where some buyers prove that being tough is the only way to make a fortune.(n)

programme.desc: The auction moves to the tiny town of Pantego, where one pair of buyers strikes gold with a curious wooden box.(n)

programme.title: Cycling: Vuelta a Espana
programme.desc: Action from the third stage of the Grand Tour race, which featured a 158.5km route from Prades Conflent Canigo to Andorra la Vella.(n)

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Chat-show host Jonathan Ross, comedienne and writer Katy Brand, Watchdog's Chris Hollins and model Jo Wood compete to win thousands of pounds for charity by taking on one of the show's resident trivia experts in a test of their general knowledge. However, they must work as a team to build their prize pot and stay one step ahead of the Chaser. Bradley Walsh asks the questions.(n)

programme.title: Ransom
programme.desc: An airline tycoon is wary of involving the police when his nine-year-old son is abducted, but co-operates with their plan to make a ransom drop. However, when the trade-off goes badly wrong, he decides to take matters into his own hands by placing a $2million bounty on the kidnappers' heads, to the consternation of the cops and his anxious wife. Thriller, starring Mel Gibson, Rene Russo, Gary Sinise, Delroy Lindo and Liev Schreiber.(n)

programme.title: The Class of '92
programme.desc: Documentary telling the story of six of Manchester United's most successful players - David Beckham, Nicky Butt, Ryan Giggs, Paul Scholes and Phil and Gary Neville. The film follows their rise from playing for the club's youth team to forming part of a squad that would win the European Cup. With contributions from the six players, as well as Eric Cantona and Zinedine Zidane.(n)

programme.desc: An escaped convict kidnaps Ed, leaving Ironside facing a race against time to find them - before the corrupt Sheriff gets to them first.(n)

programme.title: Quincy ME
programme.desc: Asten conducts a rushed autopsy on the body of a nightclub owner whose premises were destroyed in a mysterious fire, but Quincy disagrees with the verdict, convinced a grave mistake has been made. Jack Klugman stars.(n)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The Las Vegas pawnbrokers consider a 1939 Second World War plane, an 1812 munitions receipt signed by future president Andrew Jackson and two life-size cowboy mannequins.(n)

programme.title: Women's Rugby World Cup 2017
programme.desc: New Zealand v USA (Kick-off 5.00pm). Coverage of the first semi-final, which takes place at Kingspan Stadium in Belfast. Presented by Jill Douglas, with analysis from Maggie Alphonsi and David Flatman, and commentary by Nick Mullins and Catherine Spencer.(n)

programme.title: Women's Rugby World Cup 2017
programme.desc: England v France (Kick-off 7.45pm). Coverage of the second semi-final, which takes place at Kingspan Stadium in Belfast. England progressed to this match after finishing at the top of Pool B, winning all three of their matches against Spain, Italy and the United States, and scoring 27 tries in the process. Presented by Jill Douglas, with analysis from Maggie Alphonsi and David Flatman, and commentary by Nick Mullins and Catherine Spencer.(n)

programme.title: Cycling: Vuelta a Espana
programme.desc: Action from the fourth stage of the Grand Tour race, which features a 198.2km route from Escaldes-Engordany to Tarragona.(n)

programme.title: Rambo III
programme.desc: Vietnam veteran John Rambo turns down a request from his old colonel to join a mission in Soviet-occupied Afghanistan. However, when the officer is captured, Rambo sets off to save him, joining the Mujahedeen rebels in fighting against the Russian invaders. Action adventure sequel, starring Sylvester Stallone, Richard Crenna, Kurtwood Smith, Marc de Jonge and Sasson Gabai.(n)

programme.title: The Chief
programme.desc: Major Davis, Chairman of the Police Authority, tries to persuade Stafford to ban a left wing student demonstration at a local university. Stafford knows that the protest is not illegal and refuses to act - a decision that has repercussions at a Masonic lodge with many police as members. Police drama, starring Tim Pigott-Smith.(n)

programme.title: Kavanagh QC
programme.desc: James returns to his home town of Bolton to defend a couple living in a run-down flat who have been accused of murdering their baby daughter. However, conflicting testimony soon brings him up against his learned friend, Head of Chambers Peter Foxcott. Starring John Thaw, Oliver Ford Davies and Haydn Gwynne.(n)

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: James reluctantly allows Georgina to throw a party at Eaton Place on the same day the new governess is expected to arrive, leaving both Hudson and the children with reservations.(n)

programme.title: Always and Everyone
programme.desc: Robert's first day back at work after his suspension proves a harrowing experience for all concerned as he announces that he's planning to leave for good - a revelation that leaves both Christine and Sunita downcast. A guilt-ridden Sam witnesses the human cost of drug dealing and the death of a youth who suffered a massive epileptic seizure presents Judy and Danny with a dilemma.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Nick struggles with parental responsibility alone, while coming to terms with Kate's death and juggling his police duties.(n)

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: The pipe-smoking sleuth is forced to take drastic measures to trap a serial killer terrorising the women of Montmartre, employing a policewoman as a decoy. Drama starring Michael Gambon, with Ciaran Madden and Geoffrey Hutchings.(n)

programme.title: The Chief
programme.desc: When Stafford defies an order to evict trespassing protestors, the Home Office decide to find him a new position.(n)

programme.title: Kavanagh QC
programme.desc: The normally resourceful barrister struggles to come up with a defence when confronted with a client who openly admits to the court that she killed her husband. To make matters worse, he is also co-opted into acting on behalf of wayward colleague Jeremy Aldermarten, whose tendency to take liberties has led to accusations of professional misconduct. Drama, starring John Thaw and Lynda Steadman.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Newcomers to Aidensfield are treated with hostility by local residents, and the police investigate the case of a peeping Tom.(n)

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: James and Virginia fail to return from a pleasure flight, sparking new fears of tragedy in the Bellamy household. Richard fears his wife and son have eloped and gives them a dressing down when they eventually come home.(n)

programme.title: Always and Everyone
programme.desc: The team plan a farewell party for Robert on his final day at St Vic's, but Christine is in the doldrums at the prospect of him leaving and can't bring herself to share Jack's enthusiasm for their wedding. Sam is mortified to learn James has paid off the drug dealers and their relationship is left dead in the water when his pregnant wife turns up unannounced at Robert's party. Martin Shaw, Niamh Cusack and Michael Kitchen star.(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: The death of an unpopular art dealer leaves Poirot with a long list of suspects within his tangled, squabbling family - even though his eccentric wife had predicted his end. Detective drama, starring David Suchet, with Emma Fielding, Fiona Walker and Jeremy Northam.(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.sub-title: The Jewel Robbery at the Grand Metropolitan.
programme.desc: On doctor's orders, the dapper Belgian sleuth visits Brighton for what he hopes will be a relaxing holiday, but it leads to one of the most absorbing cases he has ever faced - the disappearance of a cache of jewels. Mystery, starring David Suchet, with Hermione Norris, Philip Jackson and Sorcha Cusack.(n)

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: Leonard gets caught up in an armed robbery at the village post office, and manages to identify the masked culprit. Geordie takes no chances when going to arrest the criminal, who has a record of similarly violent crimes - but is surprised to discover that the suspect has been murdered. Meanwhile, a second robbery occurs, carried out by a man and a woman who have adopted the dead robber's trademark of disguising himself with a gas mask. Back at the Vicarage, the atmosphere is tense between Sidney and Amanda.(n)

programme.title: The Americans
programme.desc: A surprise assignment from the Centre divides Philip and Elizabeth, forcing them into a moment of profound crisis. Stan gives Henry a tour of the FBI.(n)

programme.title: Midwinter of the Spirit
programme.desc: Merrily is on a quest for answers after a murder, a desecrated church and a clergyman's apparent `suicide'. She suspects a Satanic group may be at work, and is guided through a ceremony of lesser exorcism by Huw Owen, but nothing can prepare her for what she is about to uncover. Crime drama, starring Anna Maxwell Martin.(n)

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: A woman is murdered in a hedgerow but her son survives the attack, only to fall beneath the ice of a frozen pond as he makes his escape. DCI Vera Stanhope wades in and drags him out, and against all the odds he pulls through. As the investigation into the mother's killing unfolds, Vera finds a kindred spirit in the boy and comes to realise the key to solving the case lies deep in his memory. Detective drama, starring Brenda Blethyn, with Kerry Fox and Kieran O'Brien.(n)

programme.title: Arthur & George
programme.desc: Determined to prove his critics wrong and find out whether George has been hiding anything, Arthur attacks the case with renewed fervour, uncovering fresh evidence that suggests a very different explanation to the one found by the police. However, he and Woodie are led into further danger when it seems the Wyrley Ripper is still at large. On a mission that could expose corruption in the establishment, will Arthur be able to show the world that the young solicitor is innocent? Martin Clunes stars in the period drama. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Crime Stories
programme.desc: A shop assistant is hospitalised following an armed robbery, and DI Preston begins to suspect that one of the woman's colleagues played a part in the hold-up. Meanwhile, footage of a drug dealer's car links him to the crime, so officers put pressure on his girlfriend to confess what she knows. Drama, starring Jane Antrobus, Marc Silcock and Zoe Lister.(n)

programme.title: The Chief
programme.desc: A series of bomb hoax calls by an animal rights group welcome Stafford's return to the force. Police drama, starring Tim Pigott-Smith.(n)

Starring David Jason, Pam Ferris and Catherine Zeta-Jones.(n)

Mystery, starring David Suchet, with Hermione Norris, Philip Jackson and Sorcha Cusack.(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot

She discovers the dead man had ties to some very dangerous people, many of whom may have wanted him dead, while a witness's testimony links the case to a remote farm where a murder took place 13 years previously. The connection brings Kenny's past back to haunt him, as he was responsible for seeing the perpetrator convicted.(n)

programme.title: Gone
programme.desc: A haunted woman wages a valiant fight to rescue her daughter from a gang of kidnappers in this Lifetime Original Movie starring Molly Parker (Deadwood, The Road). The victim of a brutal assault that destroyed her marriage and threatened her future as a mother, Amy is devastated when her young daughter, Emily, is suddenly and mysteriously abducted. But when the kidnappers attempt to manipulate Amy into killing a patient in the hospital where she works in exchange for her daughter's safe return, the desperate mother boldly refuses. Now, as Amy searches desperately for clues to Emily's whereabouts, she gradually discovers that the malevolent plot leads directly to the most powerful people in her city. With the police and local politicians doing everything in their power to destroy her family, Amy must avoid succumbing to the emotional pain of her past trauma, and find her daughter so the conspiracy will be exposed and justice served(n)

programme.title: Taken
programme.desc: Liam Neeson stars as former CIA operative Bryan Mills, who's desperate to track down his kidnapped daughter in Pierre Morel's Luc Besson-produced action-thriller. Mills' life hasn't panned out well; his dedication to the CIA wrecked his marriage and made him neglect his daughter Kim. Now, retired from the Agency, he wants to make things up to Kim. But to do so, he has to contend with his ex-wife's animosity and Kim's new step-father's wealth. So when he has an opportunity to advance Kim's pop star ambitions he jumps at the chance, even if that means her and a friend crossing the Atlantic to brave 'the dangers of Europe'. As things turn out, he has a point: in Paris, the two girls are kidnapped by vicious Eastern European sex traffickers. As they are being abducted, Bryan tells one of the baddies, via Kim's mobile phone: 'I will look for you, I will find you, and I will kill you'. He subsequently does his best to make good on his promise, using all the violent tricks of the trade his time at the CIA taught him(n)
